title: Process of allotment of tenements to beneficiaries, lease conditions including those pertaining to transfer, formation of co-operative housing societies and policy of maintenance of common amenities of buildings and layout as well as policy regarding any other relevant matter shall be as determined by Corporation from time to time

section: Process of Allotment to Beneficiaries and Conditions thereof :-
